name: N-Picross - Nokia Jam 4
description:
Running on TIC-80 tiny computer 0.90.1723 Pro (with editors disabled)
Code (LUA script, procedural) by Kyuchumimo
Title screen, Nonograms by Alexx Dip

KNOWN ISSUES
• When the timer runs out, the timer displays a value of -1:59. This is because the condition t>=0 was used to subtract the time and not t>0. This does not affect the game and it will be fixed once the voting is over.

• Columns 3, 4 and 5 of level 2-3 say 2 in the solution, but it should be a 3

CONTROLS

UP
Arrow up [↑] key
DOWNArrow down [↓] keyLEFTArrow left [←] key
RIGHT
Arrow right [→] keySELECT / WRITE
(A) button / [Z] key
C / MARK(B) button / [X] key
